segments.text: Hi , Mike . Haven't seen you for a while . How's Cathy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We are not seeing each other any more .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What happened ? Did you break up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . I got sick and tired of her nagging all the time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I am sorry . Maybe you were just emotional at that moment . Do you think you guys can get back together ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know . There â€™ s plenty of fish out there in the sea !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , you are such a dog !
segments.speaker: S1
